text: A simple life, a beautiful death
description: Grants a loadout of basic weapons
Adds Pump-Action Shotgun, Bolt Action Rifle, Mauser Pistol, and Semi-Automatic Pistol weapons to your inventory
Grants a loadout of stealth weaponry (Machete, Tomahawks, and Knives)
Grants a loadout of Gunslinger weapons (Off-hand holster, Double Action revolver, Schofield Revolver, Double Barreled Shotgun)

text: You long for sigh and see nothing

description: Unlocks all outfits in Arthur's wardrobe
Unlockas all ledger upgrades and increases max supply levels

text: You revel in your disgrace, I see
description: Sets honor to the minimum amount
Resets your honor meter to neutral
Allows you to auto-paint targets in Deadeye
Deadeye skill rank 3 (stay in Deadeye after firing)
Deadeye skill rank 5 (highlight critical hit areas)
Refills all bars for health, stamina, and dead eye

text: Seek all the bounty of this place
You seek more than the world offers
description: Refill and fortify all your bars
You can call a horse from any distance
Increases your bonding with all owned horses

text: You are a beast built for war
The best of the old ways

description: Spawns a wagon with one horse

text: Would you be happier as a clown?
You want more than you have

description: Spawns a horse with a cart

text: You want everyone to go away
description: Eliminates all wanted ratings and bounties
